::DarkMouse::

She turned and looked at Scorponok.

"Look bug face.  I was ordered to find us a base.  If you don't want to 
help.  Fine with me.  Why don't you go back and help out with the pod if you 
hate me so darned much.  I'll find the base by myself without you then."  
She ran down the hillside and after the glittering object leaving Scorponok 
far behind.
